ComicInfo.Title: Brought to Light
ComicInfo.Summary: Jackie fights the Angelus during daylight and manages to escape from her. But not without taking a hostage with her. The Angelus is outraged and sends out all her warriors to find him, but Jackie is taking care of his own bussiness. However, Jenny learns the horrible truth behind Jackie.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-23 22:43:37. [CVDB43675]
ComicInfo.Inker: Jeff de los Santos, Marcia Chen, Matt Banning, Victor Llamas
ComicInfo.Colorist: Bike Kinzle, Greg Hammond, Liquid!, Matt Nelson, Steve Firchow, Tyson Wengler
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Marc Silvestri, Matt Banning, Steve Firchow
ComicInfo.Characters: Angelus's Familiar, Frankie Franchetti, Jackie Estacado, Jenny Romano, Sonatine, The Angelus, Vinnie, Wenders
ComicInfo.Teams: Angelus Warriors, Darklings, The Brotherhood Of Darkness, The Franchetti Family
ComicInfo.Locations: New York City, New York State, Statue of Liberty
